name: Speak-No-Evil Monkey
baseMeaning: A monkey covering its mouth with its hands.
tldr: 'Oops I said too much' or keeping a secret. The 'shouldn't have said that' emoji.

contextMeanings.meaning: Said something you shouldn't have - oops!
Implying you have gossip or a secret.
Pretending to keep quiet about something obvious.

platformNotes.note: Used when sharing gossip or saying something spicy.
Common in captions implying secrets or surprises.
Standard 'oops I said too much' emoji.

generationalNotes.note: Used for gossip or 'accidentally' sharing secrets.
May connect to the 'speak no evil' proverb.
